paper_abstract: This paper proposes a generalization of column generation, reformulating the master problem with fewer variables at the expense of adding more constraints; the sub-problem structure does not change. It shows both analytically and computationally that the reformulation promotes faster convergence to an optimal solution in application to a linear program and to the relaxation of an integer program at each node in the branch-and-bound tree. Further, it shows that this reformulation subsumes and generalizes prior approaches that have been shown to improve the rate of convergence in special cases.
paper_title: A generalization of column generation to accelerate convergence
